summary: This module defines comprehensive test suites for the Stable Diffusion SAG image generation pipeline, covering both full integration scenarios and fast unit-like checks. The tests validate correct pipeline execution, batch processing consistency, scheduler compatibility, deterministic behavior, and optional xformers attention support, using dummy components and real model configurations.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of the Stable Diffusion SAG pipeline across diverse configurations, preventing regressions and ensuring highâ€‘quality image generation for downstream products and services.
